title.native: さようなら竜生、こんにちは人生

description:
Long ago, the most ancient of divine dragons was slain by a human. The mighty dragon accepted its death when suddenly, it was reborn as Dolan, a man who lives in a quiet village. While spending another peaceful day toiling in the fields, he meets Celina, a half-human, half-snake creature looking for a partner. The unlikely duo become friends, but challenges lie ahead that threaten their new bond.

(Source: Cunchyroll)

tags.name: Reincarnation
tags.description: Features a character being born again after death, typically as another person or in another world.

tags.name: Dragons
tags.description: Prominently features mythical reptiles which generally have wings and can breathe fire.

tags.name: Monster Girl
tags.description: Prominently features a female character who is part-monster.

tags.name: Rural
tags.description: Partly or completely set in the countryside.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Body Horror
tags.description: Features characters who undergo horrific transformations or disfigurement, often to their own detriment.

tags.name: Elf
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is an elf.

node.description:
**Alma Mater:** Liverpool Institute for Performing Arts (BA Music)

[Website](https://tatsumusic.net/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/tatsu_saiki) | [SoundCloud](https://soundcloud.com/tatsuyan)

**Education:** Kunitachi College of Music

[Staff Page (Nichion)](https://www.nichionsakka.com/hanae-nakamura)

Hanae Nakamura is a music composer.

**[Website](https://everdre.jp/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/@EverdreaM_official) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/EverdreOfficial)**

**EverdreaM** is a Japanese music duo consist of Misato ([Misato Matsuoka](https://anilist.co/staff/149680/Misato-Matsuoka)) and Hitomi ([Hitomi Sekine](https://anilist.co/staff/191744/Hitomi-Sekine)).
